articles.description: Krafton has released an update on its BGMI Beta Test ahead of the game's re-release.
articles.content: An official statement from KRAFTON says, Currently, the closed test track for BGMI is updated. Those who opted for a public test for the game before its launch are expected to get a message which tak… [+340 chars]
